title: Petition to Remove Sated Devourer
body:
And replace it with post-nerf feral flare and revert camp spawn timers nerf.
Feral flare gave us the raw stats that we wanted and not this damage over time bullshit with the new jungle items.
Bring back madred's, and wriggles, ofc.
"Madstone" =whatever upgraded smite you want+madreds
Keep the 5 dragon stacking, 2 scuttle, and make it 2 stacks per kill again.
Boom. And I'm not even on the balance team.
